properties.areaDesc: Western Franklin; Northern Worcester; Eastern Franklin; Northwest Middlesex County
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 1:05AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
Snow is expected to begin between 2 and 4 AM across the area as
precipitation moves in from eastern New York. A steady light to at
times moderate-intensity snow is expected for the overnight into
the pre-dawn hours, which will reduce visibilities and result in a
quick coating to two inches on roads through 4 AM. Snow amounts
will be greatest in the eastern slopes of the Berkshires and
hills of northern Worcester County.

Drivers early this morning should be prepared to encounter
reduced visibilities and a greasy accumulation of snow on roads.
Drive slowly if traveling overnight.

NWSheadline: STEADY SNOW EXPECTED TO BEGIN EARLY THIS MORNING ACROSS NORTHERN MASSACHUSETTS
